title: golang-nuts - banned?
body: My apologies for the off topic issue, but since I can't post to golang-nuts I was not sure where else to raise this. I appear to have been banned from the golang-nuts group, but am not sure why. Is it possible to clarify why, or possibly reinstate my membership? It would have been through my google account `lstask@gmail.com`, with an additional email address `liam@stask.net` Thanks.
